title: Gini index of Taiwan 2008 to 2018
summary: In general Gini's concentration coefficient has stayed the same over the Year.

Gini's concentration coefficient is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, gradually decreasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2014 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Gini's concentration coefficient, of value 34.5 was reached at Year 2009
The lowest Gini's concentration coefficient, of value 33.6 was reported at Year 2013,  2014, and 2016
min_summary: Overall Gini's concentration coefficient has decreased over the Year.
